TopicTitle: Why don't we have a "KSP Nerd" meme?

Articles.Content:
We should have a picture of someone hunched over their computer playing KSP with a meme caption. I have an idea...

'ACCIDENTALLY SAYS 'MUN'.... IN REAL LIFE...'

'FRIEND HAS PROBLEM AT SCHOOL? SUGGEST MOAR BOOSTERS'

I don\'t know. Someone submit some ideas.

Eh, just Jeb smiling on a green-and-lighter green triangles (like most other memes) background like this.

[Question]?

*jeb face*

MOAR BOOSTERS

So here\'s an idea:

Pants keep falling down?

MOAR BOOSTERS

Jebediah Kerman - Thrill Master MEME!

http://www.quickmeme.com/Jebediah-Kerman---Thrill-Master/?upcoming

Have Fun, everyone!

Jebediah Kerman - Thrill Master MEME!

http://www.quickmeme.com/Jebediah-Kerman---Thrill-Master/?upcoming

Have Fun, everyone!

GENIUS!

http://qkme.me/3ppecw
On several accounts I\'ve almost said 'Mun' instead of 'Moon' in real life

-snip-

'ACCIDENTALLY SAYS 'MUN'.... IN REAL LIFE...'

-snip

i did that >_<

On several accounts I\'ve almost said 'Mun' instead of 'Moon' in real life

Same with me. I have to stop myself ALL-THE-TIME. Kosmo-Not made that mistake today. We were discussing the Apollo missions and he called it the Mun a few times. lol

When I\'m explaining the game to people who don\'t play, I don\'t even bother calling them Kerbin/Mun though.

I just say earth and Moon at 1/6th the scale of real life.

I get a slight tick everytime I say Moon though
@Vincent, sss, that\'s just socially awkward penguin.

Well, that\'s how I work, anyways.

Jeb is indeed scared of explosions.
I keep saying TMI instead of TLI IRL... /facepalm.

I keep saying TMI instead of TLI IRL... /facepalm.

I never say Trans-Munar Injection in KSP or in real life. I only use TMI in KSP when talking about a Trans-Minmus Injection. I always call it LUNAR in KSP.

Wow this is awesome. Time to make my own!

EDIT: Added two!
